question: What is the effect of incorporating  degree‐heterogeneous networks structure in an SEIR model on disease dynamics, compared to a homogeneous‐mixing network? Analyze it using both deterministic analytical methods and stochastic simulations
next_plan: We have completed network construction, parameter selection, stochastic simulation on homogeneous (Erdos-Renyi) and heterogeneous (Barabasi-Albert) networks, and extracted key metrics. Next step: provide deterministic analytical comparison via mean-field and heterogeneous mean-field equations, integrate with metrics results, then draft full IEEE LaTeX report including introduction, methodology, results, discussion, conclusion, references. Will use literature review for citations on network heterogeneity in SEIR dynamics. Also include derived R0 expressions and analytical outbreak thresholds.
